title: Client Freezes Multiple Times During Champ Select
body: I'm not sure where to put this exactly but I've been having this issue since 5.4 or 5.5 patch. During champ select my client will freeze and say "waiting for the program to respond". Any help on how to fix this would be greatly appreciated :)

replies.body:
Create a custom game and play in it for a bit. Are you experiencing lag spikes in there too? If that's the case, then it might just be a general internet connectivity problem, which would require an entirely different approach to it.

If it's smooth as a baby's bottom, then it's a configuration conflict/oversight by Riot, in which we can start troubleshooting right away.

Remember to click the 'Reply' button directly underneath this message to make sure I get notification of any responses. Hope to hear from you soon.
